name: GaW01_Code Monkey Simulator
description:
Game I've made in 6 days for a Game a Week challenge.

I wasn't able to implement everything I wanted to, like a functionnal AI for solo gameplay, and most of the code is still in blueprint although my goal was to make an entire C++ game.

But at least it has a begining and an end, so have fun ! =)

ALSO THE GAME TENDS TO CRASH AND A FATAL ERROR MESSAGE APPEARS WHEN LAUNCHED FOR THE FIRST TIME... But don't worry, it still works.

It appears to be an issue with NVIDIA stuffs wich I don't fully grasp the concept yet.

Just wait a couple of seconds and try to launch the game one or two times again and you'll be all set.
